numbered_ace_sentences: 1. In the National Football League, 13 percent of head coaches are head coaches of color.
2. This percentage is the smallest percentage of head coaches of color among MLB and NBA and MLS and WNBA.
3. WNBA is the only women's sport in the list.
4. In MLS, the percentage of players of color is close to the percentage of head coaches of color.
5. In WNBA and NBA, the percentage of players of color is equal.
6. In NBA, the percentage of head coaches of color is 5 percent higher than in WNBA.
7. Only managers are shown for MLB.
8. I wonder why only managers are shown for MLB.
9. I wonder how players are recruited into WNBA.
10. I wonder how players are recruited into NBA.
11. I wonder what the criteria for being a head coach is.
12. I wonder why there are fewer head coaches of color than players of color.
13. I wonder why MLB contains fewer players of color.
14. I wonder why MLS contains fewer players of color.
15. In my community, the job market for head coaches of color is limited.
16. In my community, students are interested in being football players.
17. This interest means that more students of color have the ability to make their dreams come true.
18. The headline is: Sports: Diversity or Lies or Head Coaches of Color?
19. The headline is: The Color spectrum in Sports.
